chunk:
Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Water, Propanediol, Glycerin, Betaine, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Gluconolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Fructooligosaccharides, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract
book: 0035-auraiha Naturally Luminous Mist and Set Spray

chunk: Directions: where: face, neck, and chest how: hold about 6 inches from face, close eyes, then gently press down to spray. Repeat whenever you desire a refresh. why: addresses short and long-term skin hydration through a plant-derived mixture. Use under or over makeup. Recycle this bottle
book: 0035-auraiha Naturally Luminous Mist and Set Spray

chunk: Warnings: : For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
book: 0035-auraiha Naturally Luminous Mist and Set Spray
